resources.string: Location permission is required to fetch the forecast nearest to you. Please go into settings and grant it, then pull down to refresh.
Current web bulb temperature estimate based on your location
Generally safe at any activity level.
Prolonged periods of exercise should be accompanied by adequate replenishment of water.
Risk of heatstroke begins, rest periods should be taken every 30 minutes when performing heavy exercise.
Heavy exercise should be avoided, and both rest and water should be taken aggressively.
Approaching upper limit of survivability, avoid all exertion.
Regardless of fitness levels, exposure leads to certain death within hours.
